Badass of the week expose you the story of the most badasses people in Ages ! This application is a simple tool helping you to keep tracks of your readings, set favorite or share stuff to your friends.

All the content came from www.badassoftheweek.com edited by Ben Thompson.
If you like his work, please consider buying one of his book for more awesomeness !
This android application is open source, feel free to do whatever you want about it !
